title: So... Nasus is OP
body:
So

Pick a champ that counters him

Beat him so that he only gets 100 or so stacks,

Still somehow 1 shots the enemy adc.

Catches up 10 minutes later with 450 stacks

GG Nasus.

How do you even begin to nerf him?

Remove the massive slow on his Wither?

Or decrease the amount of stacks Q generates?
